Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Ice : Coldness :: Earth : ?


A. Weight
B. Jungle
C. Gravitation
D. Sea
Solution: As effect of Ice is coldness similarly the effect of Earth is gravitation.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Parts : Strap :: Wolf : ?


A. Fox
B. Animal
C. Wood
D. Flow

In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Physician : Treatment :: Judge : ?


A. Punishment
B. Judgement
C. Lawyer
D. Court
Solution: As Physician does the treatment similarly Judge delivers the judgement.
